title: Ticket #592: Investigate crondor behavior to better document
description:
In the manual, in the section Semantics for CronTab Specification. "The day will be the logical or of both [cron_day_of_month and cron_day_of_week]." This is likely true... unless one of the two, but not both, is set to "* ". In that case, the "* " is probably discarded and treated as an empty set. If this was not the case, setting "cron_day_of_week=1" would run on every single day. Someone needs to verify what the code is doing, then update the manual to match.

(Filed as a code defect because someone from the dev team needs to confirm the actual behavior. Once we know that for certain, adding it to the manual becomes a documentation task.)

(Extracted from #375)
